page.title: 18Sport in Burton
page.content: There are many different kinds of recreation available in Burton for those who are interested.At the school children play football,cricket, badminton,rounders and netball and take part in athletic events. Outside the school there are football teams for men and boys.Badminton is available for all in the village hall and children can receive coaching as well. At the Playing Fields there is a Tennis Club which anyone can join.Boys and girls can get coaching. Football and cricket are also played at the Playing Fields.Near the Playing Fields a bowling green is being built so men and women will be able to play bowls soon.The Cubs also play their football at the Playing Fields. A lot of boys and girls get a lot of enjoyment out of the Playing Fields.
